headlines.description: Sadio Mane had a brace and Mohamed Salah scored twice as Liverpool opened the Premier League season with a 4-0 victory over West Ham.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mane nets brace as Liverpool beat West Ham

headlines.description: Burnley were held to a goalless draw away against Southampton on Sunday with Joe Hart making several saves in his Premier League debut for the club.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hart shines in Burnley debut vs. Southampton

headlines.description: Raheem Sterling and Bernardo Silva spoiled the Premier League debut of Arsenal manager Unai Emery as Manchester City won 2-0 at the Emirates.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man City spoil Emery's Premier League debut
